atk-s0502a19:2: Natena hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto vinicchayamahāmatte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:3_0: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṁ uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā
atk-s0502a19:3_1: nagaramajjhena vihāraṁ āgacchanti. Tasmiṁ khaṇe megho uṭṭhāya pāvassi. Te sammukhāgataṁ
atk-s0502a19:3_2: vinicchayasālaṁ pavisitvā vinicchayamahāmatte lañjaṁ gahetvā sāmike asāmike karonte
atk-s0502a19:3_3: disvā ‘‘aho ime adhammikā, mayaṁ pana ‘ime dhammena vinicchayaṁ karontī’ti saññino
atk-s0502a19:3_4: ahumhā’’ti cintetvā vasse vigate vihāraṁ gantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinnā
atk-s0502a19:3_5: tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. Satthā ‘‘na, bhikkhave, chandādivasikā hutvā sāhasena atthaṁ
atk-s0502a19:3_6: vinicchinantā dhammaṭṭhā nāma honti, aparādhaṁ pana anuvijjitvā aparādhānurūpaṁ asāhasena
atk-s0502a19:3_7: vinicchayaṁ karontā eva dhammaṭṭhā nāma hontī’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:5: ‘‘Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho, yenatthaṁ sāhasā naye;
atk-s0502a19:6: Yo ca atthaṁ anatthañca, ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a19:10_0: Tattha tenāti ettakeneva kāraṇena. Dhammaṭṭhoti rājā hi attano kātabbe vinicchayadhamme
atk-s0502a19:10_1: ṭhitopi dhammaṭṭho nāma na hoti. Yenāti yena kāraṇena. Atthanti otiṇṇaṁ vinicchitabbaṁ
atk-s0502a19:10_2: atthaṁ. Sāhasā nayeti chandādīsu patiṭṭhito sāhasena musāvādena viniccheyya. Yo hi
atk-s0502a19:10_3: chande patiṭṭhāya ñātīti vā mittoti vā musā vatvā asāmikameva sāmikaṁ karoti, dose
atk-s0502a19:10_4: patiṭṭhāya attano verīnaṁ musā vatvā sāmikameva asāmikaṁ karoti, mohe patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a19:10_5: lañjaṁ gahetvā vinicchayakāle aññavihito viya ito cito ca olokento musā vatvā ‘‘iminā
atk-s0502a19:10_6: jitaṁ, ayaṁ parājito’’ti paraṁ nīharati, bhaye patiṭṭhāya kassacideva issarajātikassa
atk-s0502a19:10_7: parājayaṁ pāpuṇantassāpi jayaṁ āropeti, ayaṁ sāhasena atthaṁ neti nāma. Eso dhammaṭṭho
atk-s0502a19:10_8: nāma na hotīti attho. Atthaṁ anatthañcāti bhūtañca abhūtañca kāraṇaṁ. Ubho niccheyyāti
atk-s0502a19:10_9: yo pana paṇḍito ubho atthānatthe vinicchinitvā vadati. Asāhasenāti amusāvādena. Dhammenāti
atk-s0502a19:10_10: vinicchayadhammena, na chandādivasena. Samenāti aparādhānurūpeneva pare nayati, jayaṁ
atk-s0502a19:10_11: vā parājayaṁ vā pāpeti. Dhammassa guttoti so dhammagutto dhammarakkhito dhammojapaññāya
atk-s0502a19:10_12: samannāgato medhāvī vinicchayadhamme ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭhoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:14: Na tena paṇḍito hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:15_0: Te kira vihārepi gāmepi bhattaggaṁ ākulaṁ karontā vicaranti. Athekadivase bhikkhū
atk-s0502a19:15_1: gāme bhattakiccaṁ katvā āgate dahare sāmaṇere ca pucchiṁsu – ‘‘kīdisaṁ, āvuso, bhattagga’’nti?
atk-s0502a19:15_2: Bhante, mā pucchatha, chabbaggiyā ‘‘mayameva viyattā, mayameva paṇḍitā, ime paharitvā
atk-s0502a19:15_3: sīse kacavaraṁ ākiritvā nīharissāmā’’ti vatvā amhe piṭṭhiyaṁ gahetvā kacavaraṁ okirantā
atk-s0502a19:15_4: bhattaggaṁ ākulaṁ akaṁsūti. Bhikkhū satthu santikaṁ gantvā tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. Satthā
atk-s0502a19:15_5: ‘‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, bahuṁ bhāsitvā pare viheṭhayamānaṁ ‘paṇḍito’ti vadāmi, kheminaṁ
atk-s0502a19:15_6: pana averīnaṁ abhayameva paṇḍitoti vadāmī’’ti vatvā imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:17: ‘‘Na tena paṇḍito hoti, yāvatā bahu bhāsati;
atk-s0502a19:19_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena kāraṇena saṅghamajjhādīsu bahuṁ katheti, tena paṇḍito nāma
atk-s0502a19:19_1: na hoti . Yo pana sayaṁ khemī pañcannaṁ verānaṁ abhāvena averī nibbhayo , yaṁ vā
atk-s0502a19:19_2: āgamma mahājanassa bhayaṁ na hoti, so paṇḍito nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:23: Na tāvatāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto ekudānattheraṁ nāma khīṇāsavaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:24: So kira ekakova ekasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe viharati, ekamevassa udānaṁ paguṇaṁ –
atk-s0502a19:29_0: So kira uposathadivasesu sayameva dhammassavanaṁ ghosetvā imaṁ gāthaṁ vadati. Pathaviundriyanasaddo
atk-s0502a19:29_1: viya devatānaṁ sādhukārasaddo hoti. Athekasmiṁ uposathadivase pañcapañcasataparivārā
atk-s0502a19:29_2: dve tipiṭakadharā bhikkhū tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṁ agamaṁsu. So te disvāva tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-s0502a19:29_3: ‘‘sādhu vo kataṁ idha āgacchantehi, ajja mayaṁ tumhākaṁ dhammaṁ suṇissāmā’’ti āha.
atk-s0502a19:29_4: Atthi pana, āvuso, idha dhammaṁ sotukāmāti. Atthi, bhante, ayaṁ vanasaṇḍo dhammassavanadivase
atk-s0502a19:29_5: devatānaṁ sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo hotīti. Tesu eko tipiṭakadharo dhammaṁ osāresi,
atk-s0502a19:29_6: eko kathesi. Ekadevatāpi sādhukāraṁ nādāsi. Te āhaṁsu – ‘‘tvaṁ, āvuso, dhammassavanadivase
atk-s0502a19:29_7: imasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāraṁ dentīti vadesi, kiṁ nāmeta’’nti.
atk-s0502a19:29_8: Bhante, aññesu divasesu sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo eva hoti, na ajja pana jānāmi
atk-s0502a19:29_9: ‘‘kimeta’’nti. ‘‘Tena hi, āvuso, tvaṁ tāva dhammaṁ kathehī’’ti. So bījaniṁ gahetvā
atk-s0502a19:29_10: āsane nisinno tameva gāthaṁ vadesi. Devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāramadaṁsu. Atha
atk-s0502a19:29_11: nesaṁ parivārā bhikkhū ujjhāyiṁsu ‘‘imasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe devatā mukholokanena sādhukāraṁ
atk-s0502a19:29_12: dadanti, tipiṭakadharabhikkhūsu ettakaṁ bhaṇantesupi kiñci pasaṁsanamattampi avatvā
atk-s0502a19:29_13: ekena mahallakattherena ekagāthāya kathitāya mahāsaddena sādhukāraṁ dadantī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:29_14: Tepi vihāraṁ gantvā satthu tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0502a19:30_0: Satthā ‘‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, yo bahumpi uggaṇhati vā bhāsati vā, taṁ dhammadharoti
atk-s0502a19:30_1: vadāmi. Yo pana ekampi gāthaṁ uggaṇhitvā saccāni paṭivijjhati, ayaṁ dhammadharo nāmā’’ti
atk-s0502a19:33: Yo ca appampi sutvāna, dhammaṁ kāyena passati;
atk-s0502a19:34: Sa ve dhammadharo hoti, yo dhammaṁ nappamajjatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:35_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena uggahaṇadhāraṇavācanādinā kāraṇena bahuṁ bhāsati, tāvattakena
atk-s0502a19:35_1: dhammadharo na hoti, vaṁsānurakkhako pana paveṇipālako nāma hoti. Yo ca appampīti
atk-s0502a19:35_2: yo pana appamattakampi sutvā dhammamanvāya atthamanvāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno
atk-s0502a19:35_3: hutvā nāmakāyena dukkhādīni parijānanto catusaccadhammaṁ passati, sa ve dhammadharo
atk-s0502a19:35_4: hoti. Yo dhammaṁ nappamajjatīti yopi āraddhavīriyo hutvā ajja ajjevāti paṭivedhaṁ
atk-s0502a19:35_5: ākaṅkhanto dhammaṁ nappamajjati, ayampi dhammadharoyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a19:39: Natena thero so hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:40_0: Ekadivasañhi tasmiṁ there satthu upaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā pakkantamatte tiṁsamattā āraññikā
atk-s0502a19:40_1: bhikkhū taṁ passantā eva āgantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā nisīdiṁsu. Satthā tesaṁ arahattūpanissayaṁ
atk-s0502a19:40_2: disvā imaṁ pañhaṁ pucchi – ‘‘ito gataṁ ekaṁ theraṁ passathā’’ti? ‘‘Na passāma, bhante’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:40_3: ‘‘Kiṁ nu diṭṭho vo’’ti? ‘‘Ekaṁ, bhante, sāmaṇeraṁ passimhā’’ti. ‘‘Na so, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a19:40_4: sāmaṇero, thero eva so’’ti? ‘‘Ativiya khuddako, bhante’’ti. ‘‘Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, mahallakabhāvena
atk-s0502a19:40_5: therāsane nisinnamattakena theroti vadāmi. Yo pana saccāni paṭivijjhitvā mahājanassa
atk-s0502a19:40_6: ahiṁsakabhāve ṭhito, ayaṁ thero nāmā’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:42: ‘‘Na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṁ siro;
atk-s0502a19:45: ‘‘Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṁsā saṁyamo damo;
atk-s0502a19:46: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:47_0: Tattha paripakkoti pariṇato, vuḍḍhabhāvaṁ pattoti attho. Moghajiṇṇoti anto therakarānaṁ
atk-s0502a19:47_1: dhammānaṁ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma. Yamhi saccañca dhammo cāti yamhi pana puggale
atk-s0502a19:47_2: soḷasahākārehi paṭividdhattā catubbidhaṁ saccaṁ, ñāṇena sacchikatattā navavidho lokuttaradhammo
atk-s0502a19:47_3: ca atthi. Ahiṁsāti ahiṁsanabhāvo. Desanāmattametaṁ, yamhi pana catubbidhāpi appamaññābhāvanā
atk-s0502a19:47_4: atthīti attho. Saṁyamo damoti sīlañceva indriyasaṁvaro ca. Vantamaloti maggañāṇena
atk-s0502a19:47_5: nīhaṭamalo. Dhīroti dhitisampanno. Theroti so imehi thirabhāvakārakehi samannāgatattā
atk-s0502a19:51: Navākkaraṇamattenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:52_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye dahare ceva sāmaṇere ca attano dhammācariyānameva cīvararajanādīni
atk-s0502a19:52_1: veyyāvaccāni karonte disvā ekacce therā cintayiṁsu – ‘‘mayampi byañjanasamaye kusalā,
atk-s0502a19:52_2: amhākameva kiñci natthi. Yaṁnūna mayaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyyāma, ‘bhante,
atk-s0502a19:52_3: mayaṁ byañjanasamaye kusalā, aññesaṁ santike dhammaṁ uggaṇhitvāpi imesaṁ santike
atk-s0502a19:52_4: asodhetvā mā sajjhāyitthāti daharasāmaṇere āṇāpethā’ti. Evañhi amhākaṁ lābhasakkāro
atk-s0502a19:52_5: vaḍḍhissatī’’ti. Te satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tathā vadiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:53_0: Satthā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā ‘‘imasmiṁ sāsane paveṇivaseneva evaṁ vattuṁ labhati, ime
atk-s0502a19:53_1: pana lābhasakkāre nissitāti ñatvā ahaṁ tumhe vākkaraṇamattena sādhurūpāti na vadāmi.
atk-s0502a19:53_2: Yassa panete issādayo dhammā arahattamaggena samucchinnā, eso eva sādhurūpo’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:56: Sādhurūpo naro hoti, issukī maccharī saṭho.
atk-s0502a19:60_1: Vaṇṇapokkharatāya vāti sarīravaṇṇassa manāpabhāvena vā. Naroti ettakeneva kāraṇena
atk-s0502a19:60_2: paralābhādīsu issāmanako pañcavidhena maccherena samannāgato kerāṭikabhāvena saṭho
atk-s0502a19:60_3: naro sādhurūpo na hoti. Yassa cetanti yassa ca puggalassetaṁ issādidosajātaṁ arahattamaggañāṇena
atk-s0502a19:60_4: samūlakaṁ chinnaṁ, mūlaghātaṁ katvā samūhataṁ , so vantadoso dhammojapaññāya samannāgato
atk-s0502a19:64: Namuṇḍakena samaṇoti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā sāvatthiyaṁ viharanto hatthakaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:65_0: So kira vādakkhitto ‘‘tumhe asukavelāya asukaṭṭhānaṁ nāma āgaccheyyātha, vādaṁ karissāmā’’ti
atk-s0502a19:65_1: vatvā puretarameva tattha gantvā ‘‘passatha, titthiyā mama bhayena nāgatā, esova
atk-s0502a19:65_2: pana nesaṁ parājayo’’tiādīni vatvā vādakkhitto aññenaññaṁ paṭicaranto vicarati. Satthā
atk-s0502a19:65_3: ‘‘hatthako kira evaṁ karotī’’ti sutvā taṁ pakkosāpetvā ‘‘saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, hatthaka,
atk-s0502a19:65_4: evaṁ karosī’’ti pucchitvā ‘‘sacca’’nti vutte, ‘‘kasmā evaṁ karosi? Evarūpañhi musāvādaṁ
atk-s0502a19:65_5: karonto sīsamuṇḍanādimatteneva samaṇo nāma na hoti. Yo pana aṇūni vā thūlāni vā pāpāni
atk-s0502a19:65_6: sametvā ṭhito, ayameva samaṇo’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:70: ‘‘Yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṁ thūlāni sabbaso;
atk-s0502a19:72_0: Tattha muṇḍakenāti sīsamuṇḍanamattena. Abbatoti sīlavatena ca dhutaṅgavatena ca virahito.
atk-s0502a19:72_1: Alikaṁ bhaṇanti musāvādaṁ bhaṇanto asampattesu ārammaṇesu icchāya pattesu ca lobhena
atk-s0502a19:72_2: samannāgato samaṇo nāma kiṁ bhavissati? Sametīti yo ca parittāni vā mahantāni vā
atk-s0502a19:72_3: pāpāni vūpasameti, so tesaṁ samitattā samaṇoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:76: Natena bhikkhu so hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:77_0: So kira bāhirasamaye pabbajitvā bhikkhaṁ caranto cintesi – ‘‘samaṇo gotamo attano
atk-s0502a19:77_1: sāvake bhikkhāya caraṇena ‘bhikkhū’ti vadati, mampi ‘bhikkhū’ti vattuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:77_2: So satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā, ‘‘bho gotama, ahampi bhikkhaṁ caritvā jīvāmi, mampi ‘bhikkhū’ti
atk-s0502a19:77_3: vadehī’’ti āha. Atha naṁ satthā ‘‘nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhanamattena bhikkhūti vadāmi.
atk-s0502a19:77_4: Na hi vissaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya vattanto bhikkhu nāma hoti. Yo pana sabbasaṅkhāresu
atk-s0502a19:77_5: saṅkhāya carati, so bhikkhu nāmā’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:79: ‘‘Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
atk-s0502a19:80: Vissaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
atk-s0502a19:83: Saṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:84_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena pare bhikkhate, tena bhikkhanamattena bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:84_1: Vissanti visamaṁ dhammaṁ, vissagandhaṁ vā kāyakammādikaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya caranto
atk-s0502a19:84_2: bhikkhu nāma na hoti. Yodhāti yo idha sāsane ubhayampetaṁ puññañca pāpañca maggabrahmacariyena
atk-s0502a19:84_3: bāhetvā panuditvā brahmacariyavā hoti. Saṅkhāyāti ñāṇena. Loketi khandhādiloke ‘‘ime
atk-s0502a19:84_4: ajjhattikā khandhā, ime bāhirā’’ti evaṁ sabbepi dhamme jānitvā carati, so tena ñāṇena
atk-s0502a19:88: Namonenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto titthiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:89_0: Te kira bhuttaṭṭhānesu manussānaṁ ‘‘khemaṁ hotu, sukhaṁ hotu, āyu vaḍḍhatu, asukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a19:89_1: nāma kalalaṁ atthi, asukaṭṭhāne nāma kaṇṭako atthi, evarūpaṁ ṭhānaṁ gantuṁ na vaṭṭatī’’tiādinā
atk-s0502a19:89_2: nayena maṅgalaṁ vatvā pakkamanti. Bhikkhū pana paṭhamabodhiyaṁ anumodanādīnaṁ ananuññātakāle
atk-s0502a19:89_3: bhattagge manussānaṁ anumodanaṁ akatvā pakkamanti. Manussā ‘‘titthiyānaṁ santikā
atk-s0502a19:89_4: maṅgalaṁ suṇāma, bhaddantā pana tuṇhībhūtā pakkamantī’’ti ujjhāyiṁsu. Bhikkhū tamatthaṁ
atk-s0502a19:89_5: satthu ārocesuṁ. Satthā, ‘‘bhikkhave, ito paṭṭhāya bhattaggādīsu yathāsukhaṁ anumodanaṁ
atk-s0502a19:89_6: karotha, upanisinnakathaṁ karotha, dhammaṁ kathethā’’ti anujāni. Te tathā kariṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:89_7: Manussā anumodanādīni suṇantā ussāhappattā bhikkhū nimantetvā sakkāraṁ karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a19:89_8: Titthiyā pana ‘‘mayaṁ munino monaṁ karoma, samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā bhattaggādīsu
atk-s0502a19:90_0: Satthā tamatthaṁ sutvā ‘‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tuṇhībhāvamattena ‘munī’ti vadāmi. Ekacce
atk-s0502a19:90_1: hi ajānantā na kathenti, ekacce avisāradatāya, ekacce ‘mā no imaṁ atisayatthaṁ aññe
atk-s0502a19:90_2: jāniṁsū’ti maccherena. Tasmā monamattena muni na hoti, pāpavūpasamena pana muni nāma
atk-s0502a19:93: Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a19:95: ‘‘Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni;
atk-s0502a19:96: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:97_0: Tattha na monenāti kāmañhi moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātena maggañāṇamonena muni nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a19:97_1: idha pana tuṇhībhāvaṁ sandhāya ‘‘monenā’’ti vuttaṁ. Mūḷharūpoti tuccharūpo. Aviddasūti
atk-s0502a19:97_2: aviññū. Evarūpo hi tuṇhībhūtopi muni nāma na hoti. Atha vā monena muni nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a19:97_3: tucchasabhāvo pana aviññū ca hotīti attho. Yo ca tulaṁva pagayhāti yathā hi tulaṁ
atk-s0502a19:97_4: gahetvā ṭhito atirekaṁ ce hoti, harati. Ūnaṁ ce hoti , pakkhipati. Evameva yo atirekaṁ
atk-s0502a19:97_5: haranto viya pāpaṁ harati parivajjeti, ūnake pakkhipanto viya kusalaṁ paripūreti.
atk-s0502a19:97_7: ādāya pāpāni akusalakammāni parivajjeti. Sa munīti so muni nāmāti attho. Tena so
atk-s0502a19:97_8: munīti kasmā pana so munīti ce? Yaṁ heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇaṁ, tena so munīti attho. So
atk-s0502a19:97_9: munāti ubho loketi yo puggalo imasmiṁ khandhādiloke tulaṁ āropetvā minanto viya ‘‘ime
atk-s0502a19:97_10: ajjhattikā khandhā, ime bāhirā’’tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munāti. Muni tena pavuccatīti
atk-s0502a19:101: Na tena ariyo hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṁ ariyaṁ nāma bālisikaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:102_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṁ disvā sāvatthiyā uttaradvāragāme
atk-s0502a19:102_1: piṇḍāya caritvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tato āgacchati. Tasmiṁ khaṇe so bālisiko balisena
atk-s0502a19:102_2: macche gaṇhanto buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ disvā balisayaṭṭhiṁ chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a19:102_3: Satthā tassa avidūre ṭhāne nivattitvā ṭhito ‘‘tvaṁ kiṁ nāmosī’’ti sāriputtattherādīnaṁ
atk-s0502a19:102_4: nāmāni pucchi. Tepi ‘‘ahaṁ sāriputto ahaṁ moggallāno’’ti attano attano nāmāni kathayiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:102_5: Bālisiko cintesi – ‘‘satthā sabbesaṁ nāmāni pucchati, mamampi nāmaṁ pucchissati maññe’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:102_6: Satthā tassa icchaṁ ñatvā, ‘‘upāsaka, tvaṁ ko nāmosī’’ti pucchitvā ‘‘ahaṁ, bhante,
atk-s0502a19:102_7: ariyo nāmā’’ti vutte ‘‘na, upāsaka, tādisā pāṇātipātino ariyā nāma honti, ariyā pana
atk-s0502a19:102_8: mahājanassa ahiṁsanabhāve ṭhitā’’ti vatvā imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:104: ‘‘Na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṁsati;
atk-s0502a19:106_0: Tattha ahiṁsāti ahiṁsanena. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yena hi pāṇāni hiṁsati, na tena kāraṇena
atk-s0502a19:106_1: ariyo hoti. Yo pana sabbapāṇānaṁ pāṇiādīhi ahiṁsanena mettādibhāvanāya patiṭṭhitattā
atk-s0502a19:106_2: hiṁsato ārāva ṭhito, ayaṁ ariyoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:107: Desanāvasāne bālisiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a19:110: Na sīlabbatamattenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule sīlādisampanne bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:111_0: Tesu kira ekaccānaṁ evaṁ ahosi – ‘‘mayaṁ sampannasīlā, mayaṁ dhutaṅgadharā, mayaṁ
atk-s0502a19:111_1: bahussutā, mayaṁ pantasenāsanavāsino, mayaṁ jhānalābhino, na amhākaṁ arahattaṁ dullabhaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:111_2: icchitadivaseyeva arahattaṁ pāpuṇissāmā’’ti. Yepi tattha anāgāmino, tesampi etadahosi
atk-s0502a19:111_3: – ‘‘na amhākaṁ idāni arahattaṁ dullabha’’nti. Te sabbepi ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a19:111_4: vanditvā nisinnā ‘‘api nu kho vo, bhikkhave, pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakaṁ patta’’nti
atk-s0502a19:111_5: satthārā puṭṭhā evamāhaṁsu – ‘‘bhante, mayaṁ evarūpā evarūpā ca, tasmā ‘icchiticchitakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0502a19:112_0: Satthā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā, ‘‘bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma parisuddhasīlādimattakena
atk-s0502a19:112_1: vā anāgāmisukhappattamattakena vā ‘appakaṁ no bhavadukkha’nti vattuṁ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a19:112_2: āsavakkhayaṁ pana appatvā ‘sukhitomhī’ti cittaṁ na uppādetabba’’nti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:119_0: Tattha sīlabbatamattenāti catupārisuddhisīlamattena vā terasadhutaṅgamattena vā.
atk-s0502a19:119_1: Bāhusaccena vāti tiṇṇaṁ piṭakānaṁ uggahitamattena vā. Samādhilābhenāti aṭṭhasamāpattiyā
atk-s0502a19:119_2: lābhena. Nekkhammasukhanti anāgāmisukhaṁ. Taṁ anāgāmisukhaṁ phusāmīti ettakamattena
atk-s0502a19:119_3: vā. Aputhujjanasevitanti puthujjanehi asevitaṁ ariyasevitameva. Bhikkhūti tesaṁ aññataraṁ
atk-s0502a19:119_4: ālapanto āha. Vissāsamāpādīti vissāsaṁ na āpajjeyya. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – bhikkhu iminā
atk-s0502a19:119_6: arahattaṁ appatto hutvā bhikkhu nāma vissāsaṁ nāpajjeyya. Yathā hi appamattakopi
atk-s0502a19:119_7: gūtho duggandho hoti, evaṁ appamattakopi bhavo dukkhoti.
atk-s0502a19:120: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahaṁsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
